description: Ralph Lauren is proud to partner with Morehouse, a prestigious historically Black college, to introduce a first-of-its-kind collection. Inspired by the rich heritage and esteemed traditions of Morehouse College, these suit trousers are tailored in Italy from chalk-stripe flannel and finished with genuine horn buttons.
fitting_details: Size 32W has a 9.75" rise and a 14.25" leg opening.
Side adjusters. Zip fly with an extended buttoned closure. Curtain waistband. Double-pleated front. Genuine horn buttons.
Side on-seam pockets. Right hip ticket pocket. Two back buttoned pockets.
Lined to the knees at the front.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 32W.
Please note that due to high demand, each Morehouse Collection style is limited to two per person.
